玊字的基本解释

玊
sù
有疵点的玉。
琢玉的工人。
姓。

玊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sù］
［《廣韻》息逐切，入屋，心。］
［《廣韻》相玉切，入燭，心。］
姓。後汉有玊況。见《後汉书·侯霸传》。

玊字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　玊； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页727第01
【正韻】玉玊二字不同。點在下畫之旁者，寶玉字也。點在中畫之旁者，須玊，許救，息六三切。玊工也。朽玊也。又國名。又人姓。俗書玊玉不辨。【正字通】禮六工，土金木石艸獸皆名工。琢玉者謂之玊工，猶剡木者謂之木工。因物殊名，不必別制玊字爲琢玊者之稱，讀玊爲粟齅二音也。今玉工通作玉，不作玊，益見玊爲贅文。雖載《正韻》，後世不信從也。

玊字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
玊字的起名意思

指有疵点的玉，也指琢玉的工人。

玊
Basic explanation of words
玊
sù
Defective jade.
Workers who cut jade.
name.
玊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sù］
["Guangyun" cuts into the house, heart. ]
["Guangyun" phase jade cut, into the candle, the heart. ]
name. There was a state of affairs in the Later Han Dynasty. See "The Book of the Later Han·Hou Ba Biography".
玊
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　玊; Kangxi Strokes: 5; Page Number: Page 727 No. 01
[Positive rhyme] The two characters Yuxie are different. The word “Baoyu” is also on the side of the next picture. Those who point to the side of the Chinese painting, Xu Jiu, Xu Jiu, Qi Liu Qiqi. Yeonggong also. Rotten 玊 also. Also the name of the country. Another surname. The common books are not distinguished. [Zhengzitong] Li Liugong, earth, gold, wood, stone and beasts are all famous workers. Those who carve jade are called dying workers, and those who shun wood are called carpenters. Because of the special name of the object, it is not necessary to make the character "Xiao" as the name of the person who "Zuo Xie", and "Xi" is the second sound of Su Xie. Nowadays, jade craftsmanship is used to make jade, not to make jade. Although it contains "Zhengyun", later generations do not believe it.
玊

玊
Name meaning
Refers to defective jade, and also refers to the workers who polish the jade.
sù
1) яшма с изъяном 有疵点的玉
2) шлифовальщик нефрита 琢玉的工人
3) Су (фамилия)
